::Skyburst::

He followed the other Autobots. He could not believe the destruction he
saw.

::Prowl:;

He backed away from the city. It now reminded him of history tapes where
he had seen Autobot City after the great battle of 2005.
He turned and saw the Autobots coming. He walked up to them.
"Thanks for coming. I'm Prowl, commander of this group. Could I help you
with anything?"
